new_datasets.author: yuhos16
new_datasets.description:
SkinCaRe: A Multimodal Dermatology Dataset with Medical Captions and Chain-of-Thought Reasoning
	

SkinCaRe bridges the gap between what models see and how they reason. It combines  

SkinCAP â€” dermatologist-authored, observation-first captions  
SkinCoT â€” clinician-certified, hierarchical Chain-of-Thought (CoT) diagnostic narratives

Total size: 7,041 dermatologic cases.

	
		
	
	
		ğŸ§­ Overview
	

Most dermatology datasets offer only class labels, limiting transparency and clinicalâ€¦ See the full description on the dataset page: https://huggingface.co/datasets/yuhos16/SkinCaRe.

new_datasets.author: THU-KEG
new_datasets.description:
[NeurlPS 2025] AgentIF: Benchmarking Instruction Following of Large Language Models in Agentic Scenarios
	


	
		
		Overview
	

AgentIF is the first benchmark designed to systematically evaluate the instruction-following capabilities of large language models (LLMs) in agentic scenarios. It consists of instructions and constraints derived from real-world agent-based applications, enabling fine-grained, executable evaluation.

	
		
		Key Features
	


Realistic
Built from 50 real-worldâ€¦ See the full description on the dataset page: https://huggingface.co/datasets/THU-KEG/AgentIF.

new_datasets.author: FBK-MT
new_datasets.description:
Dataset Description, Collection, and Source
	

MCIF (Multimodal Crosslingual Instruction Following) is a multilingual human-annotated benchmark 
based on scientific talks that is designed to evaluate instruction-following in crosslingual,
multimodal settings over both short- and long-form inputs. 
MCIF spans three core modalities -- speech, vision, and text -- and four diverse languages (English, German, Italian, and Chinese), 
enabling a comprehensive evaluation of MLLMs'â€¦ See the full description on the dataset page: https://huggingface.co/datasets/FBK-MT/MCIF.

new_datasets.author: sarosavo
new_datasets.description:
This repository contains the QA data presented in the paper Every Question Has Its Own Value: Reinforcement Learning with Explicit Human Values.
We propose Reinforcement Learning with Explicit Human Values (RLEV), a method that aligns Large Language Model (LLM) optimization directly with quantifiable human value signals. While Reinforcement Learning with Verifiable Rewards (RLVR) effectively
trains models in objective domains using binary correctness rewards, it overlooks that not all tasksâ€¦ See the full description on the dataset page: https://huggingface.co/datasets/sarosavo/RLEV.

new_datasets.author: TyangJN
new_datasets.description:
ORIG: Multi-Modal Retrieval-Enhanced Image Generation
	




Large Multimodal Models (LMMs) have achieved remarkable progress in generating photorealistic and prompt-aligned images, but they often produce outputs that contradict verifiable knowledge, especially when prompts involve fine-grained attributes or time-sensitive events. Conventional retrieval-augmented approaches attempt to address this issue by introducing external information, yet they are fundamentally incapable ofâ€¦ See the full description on the dataset page: https://huggingface.co/datasets/TyangJN/FIG.

new_datasets.author: MRSAudio
new_datasets.description:
MRSAudio:  A Large-Scale Multimodal Recorded Spatial Audio Dataset with Refined Annotations
	

Humans rely on multisensory integration to perceive spatial environments, where auditory cues enable sound source localization in three-dimensional space. 
Despite the critical role of spatial audio in immersive technologies such as VR/AR, most existing multimodal datasets provide only monaural audio, which limits the development of spatial audio generation and understanding. 
To addressâ€¦ See the full description on the dataset page: https://huggingface.co/datasets/MRSAudio/MRSAudio.

The Graph Problem Solutions Dataset aims to facilitate research and development in the field of graph theory and network analysis. This dataset contains a collection of prompts and responses related to various graph problems, including the Maximum Clique Problem, Minimum Vertex Cover, and common collaborator identification. The dataset features a structured JSON format that is easy to parse, ensuring usability for machineâ€¦ See the full description on the dataset page: https://huggingface.co/datasets/Mobiusi/Graph-Problem-Solutions-30K.

new_datasets.author: GMLHUHE
new_datasets.description:
ğŸ§  OpenR1-Psy Dataset
	

This dataset is introduced in the paper: arXiv:2505.15715


	
		
		ğŸ“˜ Overview
	

OpenR1-Psy is a large-scale psychological counseling dataset that integrates diagnostic reasoning and therapeutic reasoning to train and evaluate large language models for mental health dialogue generation.It goes beyond empathy-focused corpora by incorporating explicit reasoning traces grounded in DSM/ICD diagnostic standards and diverse psychotherapy frameworks such as CBT, ACTâ€¦ See the full description on the dataset page: https://huggingface.co/datasets/GMLHUHE/OpenR1-Psy.

new_datasets.author: HuggingFaceM4
new_datasets.description:
Fine Vision
	


FineVision is a massive collection of datasets with 17.3M images, 24.3M samples, 88.9M turns, and 9.5B answer tokens, designed for training state-of-the-art open Vision-Language-Models.
More detail can be found in the blog post: https://huggingface.co/spaces/HuggingFaceM4/FineVision
The version in this repository concatenated all the configs in the original dataset and then shuffled them. This is done to facilitate streaming the data directly from the hub!

new_datasets.author: Yuan4629
new_datasets.description:
WereBench
	

WereBench is a benchmark dataset for evaluating language models in the Werewolf (similar to Mafia) social deduction setting. It focuses on humanâ€‘aligned strategic reasoning rather than only coarse metrics (e.g., win rate), aligning model behavior with successful human strategies.

This repository hosts the data that will be uploaded to the Hugging Face Hub at datasets/Author/WereBench. The primary entry file is /data/WereBench.jsonl, and additional raw materials live underâ€¦ See the full description on the dataset page: https://huggingface.co/datasets/Yuan4629/WereBench.

new_datasets.author: Hui519
new_datasets.description:
WILDELDER: A CHINESE ELDERLY SPEECH DATASET FROM THE WILD WITH FINE-GRAINED MANUAL ANNOTATIONS
	

WildElder is a speech dataset focused on elderly scenarios. It contains raw audio and corresponding text annotations and can be used for ASR, speaker-related tasks, and front-/back-end speech processing research. The data was collected and cleaned from real-world environments to preserve diversity and realistic noise conditions.

audio/â€¦ See the full description on the dataset page: https://huggingface.co/datasets/Hui519/WildElder.

new_datasets.author: JacobLinCool
new_datasets.description:
audio-testing
	


	
		
		Overview
	

This is a small, open dataset designed for quick validation of audio-related pipelines and applications, especially for Text-to-Speech (TTS) and Speech-to-Text (STT) systems.
It provides a few short, diverse audio clips and corresponding text transcripts, allowing developers to verify input/output handling, audio processing, and transcription logic without downloading large datasets.

	
		
		Contents
	


3 short audio samples (.mp3, .wav)â€¦ See the full description on the dataset page: https://huggingface.co/datasets/JacobLinCool/audio-testing.

new_datasets.author: lamhieu
new_datasets.description:
ğŸ‘‹ xLLMs â€“ Dialogue Grettings
	

xLLMs â€“ Dialogue Grettings is a multilingual greeting & small-talk dataset for building assistants that recognize salutations, respond politely, elicit intent, and pivot from chit-chat to helpful task support.It spans 41,320 dialogues across 16 languages (en, vi, ko, es, pt, zh, fr, it, de, ja, ru, pl, nl, hi, tr, id). Each sample is a short, natural exchange that begins with a greeting and evolves into a light informational micro-task.

This datasetâ€¦ See the full description on the dataset page: https://huggingface.co/datasets/lamhieu/xllms_dialogue_greetings.

new_datasets.description:
Reasoning-Flow Dataset
	


	
		
		Overview
	

This dataset contains multilingual chain-of-thought reasoning examples for analyzing reasoning flows across different languages and logical structures. The dataset is designed for research paper "The Geometry of Reasoning: Flowing Logics in
Representation Space".

	
		
		Links
	

Paper: https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.09782
GitHub: https://github.com/MasterZhou1/Reasoning-Flow

new_datasets.author: Mobiusi
new_datasets.description:
safety_CoT_enhanced_dataset
	


	
		
		Dataset Description
	

The Enhanced Safety CoT Dataset is designed to provide high-quality, structured responses for AI applications focusing on safety and factual accuracy. This dataset aims to improve the interaction between users and AI systems by ensuring that responses adhere strictly to safety policies while delivering informative content. Key features include a diverse range of topics, concise and clear answers, and a comprehensive chain ofâ€¦ See the full description on the dataset page: https://huggingface.co/datasets/Mobiusi/safety_CoT_enhanced_dataset.

new_datasets.description:
This repository contains the dataset and supplementary materials for the paper COIG-Writer: A High-Quality Dataset for Chinese Creative Writing with Thought Processes.


	
		
		ğŸ”” Introduction
	

COIG-Writer is a large-scale Chinese creative writing dataset that connects final literary works with their underlying reasoning processes.Each sample includes a reverse-engineered writing prompt, a step-by-step reasoning trace, and the final article.This design allows researchers to exploreâ€¦ See the full description on the dataset page: https://huggingface.co/datasets/JunoLi622/COIG-Writer.

MCIF (Multimodal Crosslingual Instruction Following) is a multilingual human-annotated benchmark 
based on scientific talks that is designed to evaluate instruction-following in crosslingual,
